## MANOVA Example
### SAS Code 1
The following code performs a MANOVA analysis of the dental study data. 


```{r cars}
## Load data
library(sas7bdat)
setwd('C:/Users/psioda/Documents/GitHub/bios-courses/BIOS-767/DATA/DENTAL')
dental.data = read.sas7bdat('dental.sas7bdat')
head(dental.data)

## Run MANOVA
res.manova <- manova(cbind(dental.data$age8,dental.data$age10,dental.data$age12,dental.data$age14)~dental.data$GENDER)
summary(res.manova)
```
